inprogress_pulse:
**   >> RACE IN PROGRESS... HOLD ON! <<**
-# ‎   When a Pulse race is ongoing, the lobby is hidden in-game. Please be patient!
inprogress_hd_warn:
**   >> RACE IN PROGRESS... HOLD ON! <<**
-# ‎   Due to a bug, Vita players will be kicked if someone joins mid-race. Please wait for the race to finish.
inprogress_hd_tourney_warn:
**   >> TOURNEY IN PROGRESS... HOLD ON! <<**
-# ‎   Due to a bug, Vita players will be kicked if someone joins mid-race. **Please wait for the tournament to finish!**
returning_warn:
**   >> RETURNING TO LOBBY... HOLD ON! <<**
-# ‎   Due to a bug, Vita players will be kicked if someone joins mid-race. **Please wait for the tournament to finish!**
